mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(d.TDA_DYYYYMMDD, 'dd') AS tdaDd , TO_CHAR(d.TDA_DYYYYMMDD,'DY') AS tdaDy , TO_CHAR(d.TDA_DYYYYMMDD, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS hwApplicationdate ,TMG_F_GET_EMPLOYEES_WORKDAY(d.TDA_CWORKINGID_P, d.TDA_CCUSTOMERID, d.TDA_CCOMPANYID) AS mgdCsparechar ,hh.HW_STATUS AS hwStatus ,hh.HW_HOMEWORK AS hwHomework ,TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI(hh.HW_START) AS hwStart ,TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI(hh.HW_END) AS hwEnd ,hh.HW_COMMUTE AS hwCommute ,hh.HW_APPLICATIONCOMMENT AS hwApplicationcomment ,hh.HW_APPROVALCOMMENT AS hwApprovalcomment ,TMG_F_TRANS_WORKNAME( TDA_CEMPLOYEEID ,TDA_DYYYYMMDD ,'1' ,TDA_CCUSTOMERID ,TDA_CCOMPANYID ,'ja' ) hwCworkingid ,TDA_CEMPLOYEEID AS empid FROM TMG_DAILY d left join (SELECT h.HW_STATUS ,h.HW_HOMEWORK ,h.HW_START ,h.HW_END ,h.HW_COMMUTE ,h.HW_APPLICATIONCOMMENT ,h.HW_APPROVALCOMMENT ,h.HW_CEMPLOYEEID AS HW_CEMPLOYEEID ,h.HW_APPLICATIONDATE AS HW_APPLICATIONDATE FROM TMG_HOMEWORKDATA h WHERE TO_CHAR(HW_APPLICATIONDATE,'YYYY/MM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{baseDate},'YYYY/MM/DD'),'YYYY/MM') ) hh ON d.TDA_CEMPLOYEEID = hh.HW_CEMPLOYEEID AND d.TDA_DYYYYMMDD = to_char(hh.HW_APPLICATIONDATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') WHERE TDA_CEMPLOYEEID = #{employeeId} AND TDA_CCOMPANYID = '01' AND TDA_CCUSTOMERID = '01' AND TDA_DYYYYMMDD >= trunc(add_months(last_day(#{baseDate}), -1) + 1) AND TDA_DYYYYMMDD <= last_day(TO_DATE(#{baseDate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd')) ORDER BY TDA_DYYYYMMDD

SELECT e.empname , hw.TDA_DAY , hw.HW_STATUS , hw.HW_HOMEWORK , hw.HW_START , hw.HW_END , hw.HW_COMMUTE , hw.HW_APPLICATIONCOMMENT , hw.HW_APPROVALCOMMENT , hw.HW_TIME , e.EMPID ,TMG_F_TRANS_WORKNAME( TDA_CEMPLOYEEID ,TDA_DAY ,'1' ,'01' ,'01' ,'ja' ) hwCworkingid from ( SELECT TDA_CEMPLOYEEID , TO_CHAR(d.TDA_DYYYYMMDD, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS TDA_DAY ,hh.HW_STATUS AS HW_STATUS ,hh.HW_HOMEWORK AS HW_HOMEWORK ,TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI(hh.HW_START) AS HW_START ,TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI(hh.HW_END) AS HW_END ,hh.HW_COMMUTE AS HW_COMMUTE ,hh.HW_APPLICATIONCOMMENT AS HW_APPLICATIONCOMMENT ,hh.HW_APPROVALCOMMENT AS HW_APPROVALCOMMENT ,TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI(hh.HW_END-hh.HW_START) AS HW_TIME FROM TMG_DAILY d left join (SELECT h.HW_STATUS ,h.HW_HOMEWORK ,h.HW_START ,h.HW_END ,h.HW_COMMUTE ,h.HW_APPLICATIONCOMMENT ,h.HW_APPROVALCOMMENT ,h.HW_CEMPLOYEEID AS HW_CEMPLOYEEID ,h.HW_APPLICATIONDATE AS HW_APPLICATIONDATE FROM TMG_HOMEWORKDATA h WHERE TO_CHAR(HW_APPLICATIONDATE,'YYYY/MM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{baseDate},'YYYY/MM/DD'),'YYYY/MM') ) hh ON d.TDA_CEMPLOYEEID = hh.HW_CEMPLOYEEID AND d.TDA_DYYYYMMDD = to_char(hh.HW_APPLICATIONDATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') WHERE TDA_CCOMPANYID = '01' AND TDA_CCUSTOMERID = '01' AND TDA_DYYYYMMDD >= trunc(add_months(last_day(#{baseDate}), -1) + 1) AND TDA_DYYYYMMDD <= last_day(TO_DATE(#{baseDate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd')) )hw left join ( ${employeeId} ) e ON hw.TDA_CEMPLOYEEID = e.EMPID WHERE hw.TDA_CEMPLOYEEID = e.EMPID ORDER BY hw.TDA_CEMPLOYEEID ,hw.TDA_DAY

SELECT e.empname , hw.TDA_DAY , hw.HW_STATUS , hw.HW_HOMEWORK , hw.HW_START , hw.HW_END , hw.HW_COMMUTE , hw.HW_APPLICATIONCOMMENT , hw.HW_APPROVALCOMMENT , hw.HW_TIME , e.EMPID ,TMG_F_TRANS_WORKNAME( TDA_CEMPLOYEEID ,TDA_DAY ,'1' ,'01' ,'01' ,'ja' ) hwCworkingid from ( SELECT TDA_CEMPLOYEEID , TO_CHAR(d.TDA_DYYYYMMDD, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS TDA_DAY ,hh.HW_STATUS AS HW_STATUS ,hh.HW_HOMEWORK AS HW_HOMEWORK ,TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI(hh.HW_START) AS HW_START ,TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI(hh.HW_END) AS HW_END ,hh.HW_COMMUTE AS HW_COMMUTE ,hh.HW_APPLICATIONCOMMENT AS HW_APPLICATIONCOMMENT ,hh.HW_APPROVALCOMMENT AS HW_APPROVALCOMMENT ,TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI(hh.HW_END-hh.HW_START) AS HW_TIME FROM TMG_DAILY d left join (SELECT h.HW_STATUS ,h.HW_HOMEWORK ,h.HW_START ,h.HW_END ,h.HW_COMMUTE ,h.HW_APPLICATIONCOMMENT ,h.HW_APPROVALCOMMENT ,h.HW_CEMPLOYEEID AS HW_CEMPLOYEEID ,h.HW_APPLICATIONDATE AS HW_APPLICATIONDATE FROM TMG_HOMEWORKDATA h WHERE TO_CHAR(HW_APPLICATIONDATE,'YYYY/MM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{baseDate},'YYYY/MM/DD'),'YYYY/MM') ) hh ON d.TDA_CEMPLOYEEID = hh.HW_CEMPLOYEEID AND d.TDA_DYYYYMMDD = to_char(hh.HW_APPLICATIONDATE,'yyyy/mm/dd') WHERE TDA_CCOMPANYID = '01' AND TDA_CCUSTOMERID = '01' AND TDA_DYYYYMMDD = TO_DATE(#{baseDate},'YYYY/MM/DD') )hw left join ( ${employeeId} ) e ON hw.TDA_CEMPLOYEEID = e.EMPID WHERE hw.TDA_CEMPLOYEEID = e.EMPID ORDER BY hw.TDA_CEMPLOYEEID ,hw.TDA_DAY

SELECT e.empname AS empname , d.TDA_CHOLFLG - NVL(NOCOMMUTE,0) + NVL(COMMUTE,0) AS commute , NVL(HOMEWORKDAy, 0) AS day , NVL(HOMEWORKAM, 0) AS am , NVL(HOMEWORKPM, 0) AS pm , NVL(HOMEWORKTIME, 0) AS time from ( SELECT distinct TDA_CEMPLOYEEID AS CEMPLOYEEID ,count(CASE WHEN TDA_CWORKINGID_R in ( select MGD_CSPARECHAR1 FROM MAST_GENERIC_DETAIL WHERE MGD_CCUSTOMERID = '01' AND MGD_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK = '01' AND MGD_CGENERICGROUPID = 'TMG_HOMEWORK') THEN '1' ELSE NULL END ) AS TDA_CHOLFLG from TMG_DAILY WHERE TDA_CCUSTOMERID = '01' AND TDA_CCOMPANYID = '01' AND TDA_DYYYYMMDD >= trunc(add_months(last_day(#{baseDate}), -1) + 1) AND TDA_DYYYYMMDD <= last_day(TO_DATE(#{baseDate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd')) group BY TDA_CEMPLOYEEID ) d left join ( SELECT HW_CEMPLOYEEID ,count(CASE WHEN HW_COMMUTE = '1' AND HW_STATUS = '2' AND HW_APPLICATIONDATE in (select TDA_DYYYYMMDD from TMG_DAILY where TDA_CEMPLOYEEID = HW_CEMPLOYEEID and TDA_DYYYYMM = trunc(add_months(last_day(#{baseDate}), -1) + 1) and TDA_CWORKINGID_R in (select MGD_CSPARECHAR1 FROM MAST_GENERIC_DETAIL WHERE MGD_CCUSTOMERID = '01' AND MGD_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK = '01' AND MGD_CGENERICGROUPID = 'TMG_HOMEWORK')) THEN '1' ELSE NULL END) AS NOCOMMUTE ,count(CASE WHEN nvl(HW_COMMUTE,'2') <> '1' AND HW_STATUS = '2' AND HW_APPLICATIONDATE in (select TDA_DYYYYMMDD from TMG_DAILY where TDA_CEMPLOYEEID = HW_CEMPLOYEEID and TDA_DYYYYMM = trunc(add_months(last_day( #{baseDate}), - 1) + 1) and TDA_CWORKINGID_R not in ( select MGD_CSPARECHAR1 FROM MAST_GENERIC_DETAIL WHERE MGD_CCUSTOMERID = '01' AND MGD_CCOMPANYID_CK_FK = '01' AND MGD_CGENERICGROUPID = 'TMG_HOMEWORK')) THEN '1' ELSE NULL END) AS COMMUTE ,count(CASE WHEN HW_HOMEWORK = '1' AND HW_STATUS='2' THEN '1' ELSE NULL END) AS HOMEWORKDAy ,count(CASE WHEN HW_HOMEWORK = '2' AND HW_STATUS='2' THEN '1' ELSE NULL END) AS HOMEWORKAM ,count(CASE WHEN HW_HOMEWORK = '3' AND HW_STATUS='2' THEN '1' ELSE NULL END) AS HOMEWORKPM ,count(CASE WHEN HW_HOMEWORK = '4' AND HW_STATUS='2' THEN '1' ELSE NULL END) AS HOMEWORKTIME from TMG_HOMEWORKDATA WHERE HW_CCUSTOMERID = '01' AND HW_CCOMPANYID = '01' AND HW_APPLICATIONDATE >= trunc(add_months(last_day(#{baseDate}), -1) + 1) AND HW_APPLICATIONDATE <= last_day(TO_DATE(#{baseDate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd')) group by HW_CEMPLOYEEID ) hw ON HW_CEMPLOYEEID = d.CEMPLOYEEID INNER JOIN ( ${employeeId} ) e ON d.CEMPLOYEEID = e.EMPID WHERE d.CEMPLOYEEID = e.EMPID ORDER BY d.CEMPLOYEEID
